titles.title: A bill to exempt any road, highway, or bridge damaged by a natural disaster, including a flood, from duplicative environmental reviews if the road, highway, or bridge is reconstructed in the same location.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 7/20/2011--Introduced. Exempts from environmental review under named federal environmental laws the reconstruction process of any road, highway, or bridge that has been damaged by a natural disaster (including flood) and reconstructed in the same location.
